reasoning.questionText: Heidi is faster than Linda. Linda is faster than Mike. Who is the fastest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Heidi > Linda > Mike. So Heidi is the most fast.

reasoning.questionText: Ivan is faster than David. David is faster than Alice. Who is the fastest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Ivan > David > Alice. So Ivan is the most fast.

reasoning.questionText: Linda is shorter than Ivan. Ivan is shorter than Nancy. Who is the shortest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Linda > Ivan > Nancy. So Linda is the most short.

reasoning.questionText: Jack is faster than Paul. Paul is faster than Nancy. Who is the fastest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Jack > Paul > Nancy. So Jack is the most fast.

reasoning.questionText: Jack is taller than Heidi. Heidi is taller than David. Who is the tallest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Jack > Heidi > David. So Jack is the most tall.

reasoning.questionText: Heidi is shorter than Alice. Alice is shorter than Paul. Who is the shortest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Heidi > Alice > Paul. So Heidi is the most short.

reasoning.questionText: Paul is slower than Charlie. Charlie is slower than Jack. Who is the slowest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Paul > Charlie > Jack. So Paul is the most slow.

reasoning.questionText: David is younger than Karl. Karl is younger than Frank. Who is the youngest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: David > Karl > Frank. So David is the most young.

reasoning.questionText: Bob is taller than Linda. Linda is taller than Charlie. Who is the tallest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Bob > Linda > Charlie. So Bob is the most tall.

reasoning.questionText: Linda is older than Grace. Grace is older than Jack. Who is the oldest?
reasoning.explanation: Sequence: Linda > Grace > Jack. So Linda is the most old.

reasoning.questionText: Bob is faster than Frank. Frank is faster than Alice. Who is the fastest?
